message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180, what do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $180 is my initial asking price, I could come down to $150.  I believe this product offers significant value, even at that price.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $150 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
